text: When Jacob heard there was grain in Egypt, he said to his sons, “Why are you looking at each other?”
He then said, “Look, I hear that there is grain in Egypt. Go down there and buy grain for us so that we may live and not die.”
So ten of Joseph’s brothers went down to buy grain from Egypt.

But <st data-num="03290" class="">Jacob</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph’s</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="01144" class="">Benjamin</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>,<n id="2" /> “<st data-num="06435" class="">What if</st> some <st data-num="0611" class="">accident</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="07122" class="">happens</st><n id="4" /> to him?”
So Israel’s sons came to buy grain among the other travelers, for the famine was severe in the land of Canaan.
Now Joseph was the ruler of the country, the one who sold grain to all the people of the country. Joseph’s brothers came and bowed down before him with their faces to the ground.

When Joseph saw his brothers, he recognized them, but he pretended to be a stranger to them and spoke to them harshly. He asked, “Where do you come from?” They answered, “From the land of Canaan, to buy grain for food.”
Joseph recognized his brothers, but they did not recognize him.
Then Joseph remembered the dreams he had dreamed about them, and he said to them, “You are spies; you have come to see if our land is vulnerable!”
But they exclaimed, “No, my lord! Your servants have come to buy grain for food!
We are all the sons of one man; we are honest men! Your servants are not spies.”
“No,” he insisted, “but you have come to see if our land is vulnerable.”
They replied, “Your servants are from a family of twelve brothers. We are the sons of one man in the land of Canaan. The youngest is with our father at this time, and one is no longer alive.”
But Joseph told them, “It is just as I said to you: You are spies!

You will be <st data-num="0974" class="">tested</st> in <st data-num="02063" class="">this way</st>: As surely as <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">lives</st>,<n id="1" /> you will <st data-num="0518" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">depart</st> from <st data-num="02088" class="">this place</st> <st data-num="03588 0518">unless</st> your <st data-num="06996" class="">youngest</st> <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="02008" class="">here</st>.

<st data-num="0259" class="">One</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st> you must <st data-num="07971" class="">go</st> and <st data-num="03947" class="">get</st><n id="1" /> your <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st>, while<n id="2" /> the rest of <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="0631" class="">remain in prison</st>.<n id="3" /> In this way your <st data-num="01697" class="">words</st> may be <st data-num="0974" class="">tested</st> to see if<n id="4" /> you are <st data-num="0854" class="">telling</st> the <st data-num="0571" class="">truth</st>.<n id="5" /> <st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st>, then, <st data-num="03588" class="">as surely as</st> <st data-num="06547" class="">Pharaoh</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">lives</st>, <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="07270" class="">spies</st>!”
He <st data-num="0622 0413 04929">imprisoned</st><n id="1" /> them all for <st data-num="07969" class="">three</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.

On the <st data-num="07992" class="">third</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="06213" class="">Do</st> <st data-num="02063" class="">as I say</st><n id="1" /> and you will <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st>,<n id="2" /> for <st data-num="0589" class="">I</st> <st data-num="03372" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="03651" class="">honest men</st>, leave <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of your <st data-num="0251" class="">brothers</st> <st data-num="0631" class="">confined</st> here in <st data-num="01004 04929">prison</st><n id="1" /> while the rest of <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0935" class="">take</st> <st data-num="07668" class="">grain</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">back</st> for your <st data-num="07459" class="">hungry</st> <st data-num="01004" class="">families</st>.<n id="3" />
But you must bring your youngest brother to me. Then your words will be verified and you will not die.” They did as he said.

They said to one another, “Surely we’re being punished because of our brother, because we saw how distressed he was when he cried to us for mercy, but we refused to listen. That is why this distress has come on us!”

<st data-num="07205" class="">Reuben</st> <st data-num="06030 0559">said</st> to them, “<st data-num="03808" class="">Didn’t</st> I <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> you, ‘<st data-num="0408" class="">Don’t</st> <st data-num="02398" class="">sin</st> against the <st data-num="03206" class="">boy</st>,’ but you <st data-num="03808" class="">wouldn’t</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">listen</st>? <st data-num="01571" class="">So</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">now</st> we must <st data-num="01875" class="">pay</st> for shedding his <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st>!”<n id="1" />

(Now<n id="1" /> <st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> <st data-num="03130" class="">Joseph</st> could <st data-num="08085" class="">understand</st> them,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> he was speaking <st data-num="0996" class="">through</st> an <st data-num="03887" class="">interpreter</st>.)<n id="3" />
He turned away from them and wept. When he turned around and spoke to them again, he had Simeon taken from them and tied up before their eyes.
Then Joseph gave orders to fill their bags with grain, to return each man’s money to his sack, and to give them provisions for the journey. His orders were carried out.
So they loaded their grain on their donkeys and left.
When one of them opened his sack to get feed for his donkey at their resting place, he saw his money in the mouth of his sack.
He said to his brothers, “My money was returned! Here it is in my sack!” They were dismayed; they turned trembling to one another and said, “What in the world has God done to us?”
They returned to their father Jacob in the land of Canaan and told him all the things that had happened to them, saying,

“The <st data-num="0582" class="">man</st>, the <st data-num="0113" class="">lord</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="01696" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="07186" class="">harshly</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">to</st> us and <st data-num="05414" class="">treated</st> us<n id="1" /> as if we were<n id="2" /> <st data-num="07270" class="">spying on</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.

But we <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him, ‘<st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> are <st data-num="03651" class="">honest</st> men; we <st data-num="01961" class="">are</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="07270" class="">spies</st>!
We are from a family of twelve brothers; we are the sons of one father. One is no longer alive, and the youngest is with our father at this time in the land of Canaan.’
“Then the man, the lord of the land, said to us, ‘This is how I will find out if you are honest men. Leave one of your brothers with me, and take grain for your hungry households and go.
But bring your youngest brother back to me so I will know that you are honest men and not spies. Then I will give your brother back to you and you may move about freely in the land.’”
When they were emptying their sacks, there was each man’s bag of money in his sack! When they and their father saw the bags of money, they were afraid.
Their father Jacob said to them, “You are making me childless! Joseph is gone. Simeon is gone. And now you want to take Benjamin! Everything is against me.”
Then Reuben said to his father, “You may put my two sons to death if I do not bring him back to you. Put him in my care and I will bring him back to you.”

But Jacob replied, “My son will not go down there with you, for his brother is dead and he alone is left. If an accident happens to him on the journey you have to make, then you will bring down my gray hair in sorrow to the grave.”
